title: What Planet Rules the Eyes in Astrology?

steps.title: The Sun rules the right eye.
steps.content: The Sun rules the right eye. The Sun represents the vital spirit or life force in everyone, so it's no surprise that it influences the eyes as well as the bones, heart, skin, head, and stomach. [1] X Research source

steps.title: The Moon rules the left eye.
steps.content: The Moon rules the left eye. Some astrologers argue that when the moon is in a weak position, you may experience problems with vision or have weak eyesight. The Moon also influences the mind, lungs, brain, and heart. [2] X Research source Specifically, the Moon is weak in the Sixth, Eighth, Tenth, and Twelfth House. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Mars can influence injury to the eyes.
steps.content: Mars can influence injury to the eyes. Although the Sun and Moon rule the right and left eyes, a negative placement of Mars in the Twelfth House could cause eye injuries. Some astrologers believe that Venus influences eyesight and the appearance of your eyes. Specifically, they believe Venus is also responsible for vision problems like cataracts.

steps.title: The Twelfth House rules the eyes and eye injuries.
steps.content: The Twelfth House rules the eyes and eye injuries. The Sun in the Twelfth House can lead to injury of the right eye, while the Moon in the Twelfth House can contribute to injury of the left eye. Unfortunately, you're more likely to have blindness if both the Sun and Moon are in your Twelfth House.

steps.title: Aries rules the eyes along with the rest of the head.
steps.content: Aries rules the eyes along with the rest of the head. This just means that if Aries is your ascendant or rising sign , you're more likely to experience eye strain or headaches that weaken your eyes.
